articles.title: Halt to Intrusion of S. Korean Warships into DPEK Waters Demanded
articles.content:
Halt to Intrusion of S. Korean Warships into DPEK Waters Demanded
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Navy Command of the Korean People's Army released the following report Wednesday in connection with the south Korean military warmongers' unceasing serious military provocations in the waters on the extension of the frontline in the West Sea of Korea:
					 On Oct. 12 alone the warmongers infiltrated 16 warships into the territorial waters of the north side south of Kuwol Peak in Ssanggyo-ri, Kangryong County, South Hwanghae Province on 10 occasions, asserting that fishing boats of the north side "intruded" into their waters despite the fact that they were engaged in routine fishing operations. 
					
					 The reckless military provocations by warships of the south Korean navy have created such a serious situation that naval clash may break out between the two sides in these waters.
					
					 Such military provocations have escalated since mid-September, bringing the daily average of such cases to 3-4 in October.
					
					 The DPRK side informed the south side over international ultra shortwave walkie-talkie of the fact that the fishing boats of the north side were engaged in routine fishing operations in its territorial waters for the purpose of settling the dangerous situation and ensuring security in the waters and strongly demanded the south side withdraw warships of its navy without delay.
					
					 The warships of the south Korean navy, however, threatened to take "tough countermeasures" unless the fishing boats sail northward, an act reminding one of a chief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The gravity of the situation lies in that they are seeking an ulterior intention to defend the illegal "northern limit line" under the pretext of "checking fishing boats."
					
					 The KPA Navy will neither allow the south Korean military authorities' any slightest attempt to keep the bogus line of no legal validity as an extension of the Military Demarcation Line in the sea nor remain an on-looker to their attitude.
					
					 The south Korean military authorities' intrusion of warships into the territorial waters of the north side is part of their premeditated moves to deliberately escalate tension in the waters, a hotbed of conflict, and deteriorate the north-south relations once again.
					
					 It is clear to everyone what consequences the third skirmish in the West Sea of Korea will entail.
					
					 The warmongers of the south Korean military should stop their rash acts and put an immediate halt to the intrusion of their warships into the territorial waters of the north side.  
					
					 They should bear in mind that warnings are bound to be followed by actions.

articles.title: Franklin Graham Leaves
articles.content:
Franklin Graham Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Rev. Franklin Graham who is president of Samaritan's Purse, a non-governmental organization of the United States, and his party left for home today.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission led by Chairman Pak Hak Son left here by air Thursday to visit China.

articles.title: Reception Hosted by Egyptian Charge d'Affaires
articles.content:
Reception Hosted by Egyptian Charge d'Affaires
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Tarek Ahmed Mahfouz, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Egyptian embassy here, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Wednesday on the occasions of the 64th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 40th anniversary of the formation of the Korea-Egypt Friendship Association.
					Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education who is chairman of the association, Kim Thae Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Preview of "Unquenchable Love"
articles.content:
Preview of "Unquenchable Love"
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean Film Studio produced feature film "Unquenchable Love." 
					The film tells about the hero of the film who commits a crime against the nation after being conscripted into the south Korean puppet army during the last Korean war and goes overseas but visits the socialist homeland after the lapse of more than four decades and turns over a new leaf, deeply moved by the great all-embracing politics of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Through the portrayal of the checkered career of the hero of the film it impressively tells the truth that the blood ties of the nation are unbreakable and the country is sure to be reunified. 
					
					A preview of the film was held at the Taedongmun Cinema on Thursday.
					
					It was watched by senior party and state officials, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Spa Resources for People
articles.content:
Spa Resources for People
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Spa resources are widely utilized for the life of the working people and the improvement of their health in the DPRK.
					 The work to build the cultural houses for treatment has been actively being conducted in different parts of the country with the work to rebuild the rest homes and sanatoriums.
					
					 Recent years have witnessed growing "sanatorium villages" in areas with rich spa and medicinal spring resources including Kyongsong spa, Kangso mineral water and Sokwangsa mineral water, which are good for treatment and health.
					
					 This reflects fully the superiority of the socialist system and the validity of public health policy.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung saw to it that the spa resources had been surveyed in an overall way and rest homes and sanatoriums built in different parts of the country.
					
					 True to the lofty intention of the President, General Secretary Kim Jong Il let the state take measures to widely develop spa resources and to use them for treatment of patients in every way.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great men, many medicinal springs and spas have been found out and rest homes and sanatoriums wonderfully built across the country so that working people of all strata may enjoy their holidays and receive medical service as they want.
					
					 Sanatoriums equipped with latest medical appliances and cultural facilities have made their appearance in the famous spa areas such as Kyongsong, Kangso, Kwangmyong, Sambang and Changsong.
					
					 Many people are improving their health there every year, receiving climate treatment, physical treatment and mud treatment with spa as main treatment means.
					
					 The rich medicinal water resources, too, are made good use of.
					
					 Goods produced in the large-scale mineral water processing factories built in various parts of the country including Kangso are being sold in public service amenities of the country.

articles.title: Bio-Calcium Nutritive Pill of Mysterious Medicinal Value
articles.content:
Bio-Calcium Nutritive Pill of Mysterious Medicinal Value
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Bio-calcium nutritive pill made by the Central Zoo is enjoying popularity for its mysterious medicinal effect.
					 Made with pulverized mammalian bone-powder, a certain amount of kelp powder and physiological activators, the bio-calcium nutritive pill is a natural health food, which is potent for promoting growth, slowing down aging and improving immunity.
					
					 The pill contains more than 20 kinds of microelements including calcium, which is known as one of essential nutritive elements, amino acids, vitamins and large quantities of enzymes.
					
					 The clinical tests done at medical institutions including the Pyongyang University of Medicine Teaching Hospital show that the pill is highly efficacious for the treatment of osteoporosis, arthritis, neuralgia, colitis, dermatosis, hypertension and the like.
					
					 In particular, it cures various child diseases including rickets caused by shortage of calcium and helps growth of body.
					
					 It has not any poisoning and side-effect.
					
					 It was highly appreciated in the national exhibition of invention and new technology and the Pyongyang International Trade Fair.

articles.title: Songun Politics, Mighty Mode of Politics
articles.content:
Songun Politics, Mighty Mode of Politics
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea is supported by more and more people of the world as days go by.
					 World-startling miracles have been wrought in the efforts for defending socialism and building a great, prosperous and powerful nation. This is the brilliant victory brought about by the Songun politics.
					
					 The Songun politics embodies the Juche-oriented theory of the importance of ideology that idea decides everything and nothing is impossible to do when the ideology of the people is set in motion.
					
					 The WPK's Songun politics is the political mode which embodies the principle of theory of the importance of ideology in strengthening the might of the Korean People's Army and taking the revolutionary soldier spirit as a powerful weapon. 
					
					 The political and ideological superiority and might of the KPA is the essential characteristic of a genuine revolutionary army that any aggression army can never possess. 
					
					 It is the stand and will of the WPK that only arms with thorough ideology can ensure the victory of the revolution.
					
					 The WPK, therefore, takes ideology as the main along with arms and combines arms with ideology. It maintains the principle of pushing forward the revolution and construction with its might.
					
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit is the basis of the Songun politics.
					
					 The spirit created by the KPA is its lofty revolutionary one, the main content of which is the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the spirit of thorough implementation and the heroic self-sacrifice spirit; it is the do-or-die spirit in which one devotes the youth and life for the Party and revolution, country and people.
					
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit has been displayed to the full in all the units of the KPA and the habit of following the spirit established across the whole society. As a result, the KPA has been strengthened and developed into an army strong in idea and faith, the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu, and the Korean people have grown as a people strong in idea and faith.
					
					 Miraculous successes were made in the past nearly 15 years during which the Kanggye spirit was created, torches of Songgang and Ranam were kindled and the stamina of Thaechon pervaded the country and the "Huichon Speed," a new Chollima speed, is being created today. All these are a full demonstration of the extraordinary traction power and vitality of the revolutionary soldier spirit and the inexhaustible strength of the Songun politics.
					
					 The exploits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who was the first in history to clarify the principle of the theory of the importance of ideology and has successfully applied it to the Songun politics and thus created the great example of socialist politics, will last long along with the chronicles of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Japan's Dangerous Move for Space Militarization
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Japan's Dangerous Move for Space Militarization
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Recently Japan declared it would launch H-2A rocket for putting a spy satellite into space on November 28 at the Tanegashima Space Centre.
					Japan's repeated launch of the H-2A carrier rocket is part of its moves for emerging a military power which have reached a dangerous phase. 
					
					Japan has already built in secrecy material, technological and practical foundations for rushing headlong into space militarization.
					
					It has pushed forward in real earnest the development of technological processes for the use of space for a military purpose since 1985. It adopted the "basic law on space" late in May last year, choosing the use of space for a military purpose as a policy and is now busy rounding off even a satellite system for gathering information.
					
					Japan's moves for emerging a military power by gaining a military edge in space have already gone beyond the tolerance limit. 
					
					Japan's intention to keep launching H-2A betrays its scenario to establish a space spy system capable of making precise observation of areas of strategic importance including the DPRK and around it and mount preemptive attacks on any targets any time. 
					
					The international community should take issue with this. 
					
					The UN Security Council, however, has kept mum about those moves of Japan but pulled up the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch and went the length of unreasonably applying sanctions against the DPRK. 
					
					This double-dealing attitude of the UNSC goes to prove that it departed from the principle of impartiality in the matter concerning the development of space and its use.
					
					This unjust behavior of the UNSC running counter to the principle of impartiality should not be allowed to repeat itself anymore. 
					
					Japan should stop the moves for space militarization which are being pushed forward by abusing the wrong attitude taken by the UNSC as regards the development of space and its use.

articles.title: U.S Accused of Sparking Arms Race in Space
articles.content:
U.S Accused of Sparking Arms Race in Space
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the United States launched two satellites for "missile defense." It is now widely advertising this as a "success" and the like, claiming that it was something to be highly proud of. 
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					The U.S. is busy stepping up the war preparations while paying lip-service to "peace." Not content with this, it is escalating the arms race into space. Such behavior of the U.S. cannot be interpreted otherwise than an unpardonable criminal act.
					
					The U.S. recent satellite launch is a dangerous war move aimed at establishing a worldwide system for missile attacks, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					The U.S. put a lot of small and large military satellites into space in a bid to conduct military espionage against other countries and step up the preparation for a new space war by use of them. 
					
					The U.S is talking a lot about "disarmament" whenever an opportunity presents itself.
					
					The U.S has a huge stockpile of nuclear weapons and their delivery means, but it is busy mass-producing new type nuclear weapons and super-large bombs for destroying underground structures and other types of WMDs under the pretext of coping with "threat" from someone.
					
					The U.S loudmouthed "disarmament" is hypocritical and nothing but a wordplay to deceive the world.
					
					With no rhetoric can the U.S evade the responsibility for being the arch criminal increasing the danger of a war and escalating the arms race in space.

articles.title: Efforts for Materializing Proposal for Founding DFRK Called for
articles.content:
Efforts for Materializing Federal Formula Called for
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The proposal for reunifying the country by federal formula put forward by President Kim Il Sung is the most reasonable, realistic and fair and aboveboard one for achieving national reunification as it does not seek advantages or interests of any of the two sides--the north and the south--and is not harmful to any side either.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The application of the federal formula provides the only way of achieving the reunification of the country peacefully and most quickly by putting an end to the division of the country and attaining the reconciliation and unity between the north and the south as a homogenous nation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The proposal for reunifying the country by federal formula fully embodies the three principles of national reunification-- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--, the programme for reunification common to the nation.
					
					 The proposal meets the interests of all classes, strata and groupings in the north and the south.
					
					 It calls on the federal state to perform its main function to respect and protect the interests of all the Koreans and adhere to the principle of impartiality in its operation. 
					
					 If the country is reunified by the federal formula, the Korean nation will establish sovereignty throughout Korea and achieve the great unity as a homogenous nation and emerge an independent, peace-loving and neutral united state of the nation.
					
					 The north and the south in the historic June 15 joint declaration recognized that the north side-proposed low-level federation and the south side-proposed confederation have something in common and solemnly pledged before the whole world to work for reunification in this direction in the future.
					
					 There is no doubt that the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, the desire of all Koreans, is sure to be achieved when the north and the south sincerely implement the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies in Vietnam and Myanmar
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies in Vietnam and Myanmar
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the Ho Chi Minh Museum and Aung Thein Lynn, mayor of Yangon City of Myanmar, sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies in their countries on Oct. 9 in congratulation of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Bangladeshi and Guinean Figures Visits to DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Bangladeshi and Guinean Figures Visits to DPRK Embassies
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Dilip Barua, minister of Industries of Bangladesh who is general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the secretary general of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, and Sekou Konate, general secretary of the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea, and members of its Political Bureau paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK embassies in their countries on October 10 on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					They laid floral baskets before full-length pictures of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Celebrated in Peru
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Celebrated in Peru
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism issued bulletins on Oct. 6 to commemorate the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 83rd formation anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					The bulletin captioned "WPK Is Banner of Independence against Imperialism" said in an article:
					
					The idea, line and strategy and tactics of the WPK clearly indicate the way of accomplishing the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK on Oct. 10, 1945 and laid down a line and strategy and tactics for the victorious advance of the cause of independence against imperialism through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities in the course of leading the party for nearly half a century.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Songun idea founded by Kim Il Sung, setting forth a strategy and tactics of giving importance to arms and putting forward the army as a main force to cope with the evermore undisguised moves of the imperialists against socialism towards the end of the last century.
					
					The WPK is powerfully encouraging the implementation of the cause of independence against imperialism by setting an example in practice.
					
					Thanks to the energetic activities of the WPK, the Non-Aligned Movement has grown to be a political force not only adhering to its principle but also defending independence and positively supporting the people in their efforts to build a new society.
					
					The bulletin entitled "Party Is Standard-bearer of Songun Revolution" in an article said:
					
					The WPK having Kim Jong Il as its general secretary has grown strong to be a force guiding the cause of Songun revolution, meeting all sorts of challenges.
					
					Kim Jong Il held higher the banner of the Songun revolution on the basis of a scientific analysis into the world political situation and the situation of the Korean revolution at the end of the last century.
					
					It is thanks to the Songun idea that the WPK has functioned as a force guiding the cause of Songun as it has always adhered to the revolutionary principle and victoriously advanced socialism with arms.

articles.title: WPK Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Lecture meetings, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Guinea, Iran and India from Oct. 5 to 7 on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were photos on the immortal revolutionary exploits of the peerlessly great persons. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the lecture meetings.
					
					 Secouna Camara, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, said that "We serve the people!" is the slogan of the WPK, adding that there are many political parties in the world but it is only the WPK that put up such slogan.
					
					 He continued:
					
					The policies of the WPK for providing the people with a happy life fully reflect General Secretary Kim Jong Il's view on them.
					
					 The secretary general of the Iranian Association of the International Taekwon-Do Federation said that the WPK has fully demonstrated its might as a guide for the cause of Songun under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He stressed that all the miraculous successes made by the Korean people are entirely ascribable to the wise Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The secretary general of the Juche Idea Study Society in Uttar Pradesh State of India noted that thanks to the outstanding leaders, the WPK has covered only the road of victory without any mistake and turns and twists in implementing its line despite all sorts of tempests of history.
					
					 The participants of the film show held in Iran watched the Korean film "The Faith of Korea". 
					
					 Meanwhile, figures of Nepal and Myanmar issued statements on the same occasion.

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People Supported
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), met the DPRK ambassador to Nepal, on Oct. 8.
					The general secretary said that he was rejoiced over the successes made by the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in the 150-day campaign and sent warm congratulations to them.
					
					The great achievements made by the DPRK are the shining fruition of the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the single-minded unity and strong national power of the DPRK, he noted, and continued:
					
					The NCP (ML) will as ever strive to develop the relations with the WPK and extend invariable support and solidarity to the just cause and struggle of the WPK and the Korean people.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Brandenburg State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany published a statement on Oct. 7 on the occasion of the 29th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the second anniversary of the October 4 declaration. 
					 The statement said that the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration provided the Korean people with a great programme for achieving independent and peaceful reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself" and the adoption of the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the joint declaration.
					
					 The prospect of Korea's reunification depends on the sincere implementation of the October 4 declaration, the statement noted.
					
					 It stressed that the proposal for founding the DFRK put forward by President Kim Il Sung is the most reasonable one for reunification as it makes it possible for the Korean nation to achieve the reunification of the country by its own efforts free from interference of foreign forces. 
					
					 The statement expressed full support and solidarity to the Korean people in the struggle to achieve the peaceful reunification of the country by their own efforts in the idea of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Costa Rica
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Costa Rica
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A Costa Rican preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on Oct. 2.
					 Francisco Davila Bale, chairman of the Costa Rican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural functions introducing the revolutionary idea and immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Comandancia de Fuerzas Navales del EPC advierte al Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Comandancia de Fuerzas Navales del EPC advierte al Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ATCC) -- En relacion con que los belicistas militares surcoreanos incurren sucesivamente en los graves actos de provocacion militar en el frente del Mar Oeste de Corea, la Comandancia de las Fuerzas Navales del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 14 la siguiente informacion:
					Solo el dia 12, bajo el pretexto de que los barcos pesqueros de nuestra parte, que realizaban normalmente sus trabajos, "invadieron" la zona maritima del Sur de Corea, los belicistas del ejercito surcoreano mandaron en 10 ocasiones 16 buques de guerra a nuestras aguas territoriales al sur del pico Kuwol de la comuna de Ssangyo del distrito de Kangryong de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.
					
					Debido a las imprudentes provocaciones militares de los buques surcoreanos, se dio en esa zona una situacion tan critica que puede terminar en el conflicto armado maritimo entre ambas partes.
					
					Tales provocaciones militares, que se han incrementado de forma escalonada desde mediados de septiembre, se reportaron en octubre 3-4 veces como promedio diario.
					
					A fin de prevenir lo peligroso de la situacion y garantizar la seguridad de esa zona maritima, nuestra parte demando fuertemente a la parte Sur por el radiocomunicador de onda ultracorta internacional que retire de inmediato los buques militares surcoreanos infiltrados avisandole que los barcos pesqueros de nuestra parte estan en sus trabajos normales en nuestras aguas jurisdiccionales.
					
					Sin embargo, al igual que un bandido que quiere golpear a la victima del robo, los buques surcoreanos amenazaron con tomar "duras contramedidas" si las embarcaciones pesqueras de nuestra parte no retroceden hacia el norte.
					
					 La gravedad de esta situacion esta en la verdadera intencion de la parte Sur de mantener la ilegal "linea de limite al Norte" pretextando el "control de naves pesqueras".
					
					Las fuerzas navales del EPC no perdonaran ni en lo minimo ni se quedaran con brazos cruzados ante la conducta de las autoridades militares surcoreanas que quieren convertir la referida linea fantasmal e irracional en sentido juridico en la de demarcacion militar maritima.
					
					La intrusion en las aguas jurisdiccionales de nuestra parte, cometida por las autoridades militares surcoreanas, forma parte de las premeditadas maniobras para volver a empeorar las relaciones Norte-Sur al agravar intencionalmente la situacion de esa zona maritima fragil al conflicto armado.
					
					Resulta clara para todos cual consecuencia tendra el tercer conflicto armado en el Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					Los belicistas del ejercito surcoreano deben actuar con prudencia y abstenerse ahora mismo de los actos de incursion en nuestras aguas jurisdiccionales.
					
					Las autoridades militares surcoreanas deben tener bien presente que detras de la advertencia vienen las acciones.

articles.title: ATCC censura maniobras de Japon para militarizar el cosmos
articles.content:
ATCC censura maniobras de Japon para militarizar el cosmos
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, Japon anuncio que seria lanzado el 28 de noviembre desde el Centro Espacial de Tanegashima el cohete "H-2A" con un satelite espia a bordo.
					El sucesivo lanzamiento de los "H-2A" forma parte de las ya alarmantes maniobras de Japon para convertirse en una potencia militar.
					
					Este pais isleno ya ha sentado en silencio la base material, tecnica y practica para proceder a la militarizacion del cosmos.
					
					Desde 1985, dio buen impulso al desarrollo del proceso tecnico que permitiera usar el espacio para fines militares. 
					
					A finales de mayo del ano pasado, aprobo la "ley principal del cosmos" politizando asi el uso militar del espacio y esta completando el sistema de satelites de recogida de informaciones.
					
					Ya pasaron su limite las maniobras de Japon para convertirse en una potencia militar tomando la superioridad militar en el cosmos.
					
					El intento de Japon de lanzar uno tras otro los cohetes tipo "H-2A" insinua que el trata de establecer el sistema de espionaje espacial para vigilar con precision las zonas estrategicas incluyendo la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y su contorno y atacar preventivamente cualesquier blancos en cualquier momento.
					
					Si bien este asunto merece ser polemizado en la sociedad internacional, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU se mantiene callado de tal conducta del pais isleno.
					
					Al contrario, tomo injustas medidas de sancion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cuestionando unicamente el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos por parte de ella.
					
					Esta actitud de doble rasero del Consejo de Seguridad muestra que esta entidad internacional abandono el principio de imparcialidad en el problema del desarrollo y el uso del cosmos.   
					
					No debe repetirse mas el injusto comportamiento del CS que se contraviene al principio de imparcialidad.
					
					Japon debe abandonar sus maniobras por la militarizacion del cosmos que el impulsa abusando de la injusta actitud del CS en el desarrollo y uso del cosmos.

articles.title: EE.UU. es culpable de la carrera armamentista en el cosmos
articles.content:
EE.UU. es culpable de la carrera armamentista en el cosmos
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ATCC) -- En estos dias, Estados Unidos se ufana mucho de su reciente lanzamiento de dos satelites para la "defensa antimisil" calificandolo de "exito".
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico en su edicion de este jueves un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Es imperdonable el acto criminal de EE.UU. que habla mucho de la "paz" en lugares publicos y amplia a las espaldas la carrera armamentista hasta al universo como parte de sus desenfrenados preparativos para la guerra.
					
					El reciente lanzamiento de satelites por parte de EE.UU. es la peligrosa maniobra belica dirigida a establecer el sistema de ataque con misiles en todo el mundo.
					
					Este imperio impulsa en etapa crucial los preparativos para la nueva guerra de las galaxias mediante el espionaje militar a otros paises con numerosos satelites de uso militar de diferentes tamanos, que fueron lanzados por si mismo.
					
					En contraste con su repetido dogma de "desarme", bajo el pretexto de hacer frente a la "amenaza" de alguien, EE.UU. produce en gran medida nuevas armas nucleares, las bombas supergrandes para destruir las instalaciones subterraneas y otras armas de exterminio masivo como si fueran poco el gran numero de armas nucleares ya producidas y medios para transportarlas.
					
					Entonces, el "desarme" preconizado tanto por EE.UU. no pasa de ser una chachara para enganar al mundo.
					
					Este imperio no puede liberarse jamas de la responsabilidad de autor que aumenta el peligro de guerra y fomenta la carrera armamentista espacial.

articles.title: Sistema federal es remedio justo de reunificacion, senala Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Sistema federal es remedio justo de reunificacion, senala Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ATCC) -- El proyecto de lograr la reunificacion segun el sistema federal, presentado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, es la propuesta mas razonable, realista y equitativa que no persigue la supremacia o los intereses de una de las dos partes, o sea, el Norte y el Sur de Corea, ni perjudica a nadie. 
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado en su edicion de este jueves y prosigue: 
					
					El sistema federal es la unica via para acabar con la division del pais y realizar lo mas pronto posible y por via pacifica la reunificacion del pais mediante la reconciliacion y la unidad entre los connacionales del Norte y el Sur. 
					
					El proyecto de realizar la reunificacion segun el sistema federal encarna estrictamente los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, que resultan el programa comun de la nacion sobre esta materia, es decir, lograr la reintegracion territorial de la patria por via independiente y pacifica y mediante la gran unidad nacional. 
					
					Ese proyecto asegura por igual los intereses de todas las clases, capas y fracciones del Norte y el Sur. 
					
					Segun el, las funciones del Estado federal seran fundamentadas en el respeto y la defensa de los intereses de toda la nacion y en su gestion se materializara tambien el principio de imparcialidad. 
					
					Cuando se logre la reunificacion de la patria segun el sistema federal, la nacion coreana podra establecer la soberania en todo el pais y lograr la gran unidad nacional siendo una sola nacion y Corea sera un Estado independiente, pacifista y neutral.
					
					A traves de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, ambas partes coreanas reconocieron que tienen puntos comunes el proyecto de la parte Norte de realizar el sistema federal de bajo nivel y la propuesta de alianza de la parte Sur y proclamaron con solemnidad a todo el mundo que orientaran la reunificacion en esa direccion. 
					
					Cuando el Norte y el Sur de Corea ejecuten con sinceridad la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, se lograra indudablemente la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria, que desea toda la nacion.
